evidence.text:
Person A: It feels as if the distance has increased.
Person A: Do you see that hill? It is behind it.

Person A: There is a story about these mangroves. They would say that a spirit from the water would come and roam in the forest at night, devouring souls of the weak hearted.
Person A: Once I stayed out so late, they all thought I got eaten by the spirit! No one had lasted more than ten minutes before!
Person A: No. I thought it was my bad luck... but maybe it is only when you are afraid of something that you see it. If you are not afraid, it seizes to exist!
Person B: I should get back now

Person A: We can get some crabs for dinner too... then you can take the night bus back.
Person A: It is the least I can do! You came all the way
Person B: You are spoiling us !
